name: Consumer Mobile Fever
description: Magick Flow of Consumer Mobile experience for interacting with Fever
longFormDescription:
Part of the Salesforce for Marketing keynote, delivered from the mainstage.

A Magick Flow that demonstrates purchasing tickets, receiving email confirmation, adding to iOS wallet, and interacting through Twitter.

recordings.title: Salesforce for Marketing Engagement Reimagined for Today's Connected Customer

presenters: Eric Stahl, Katrin Rabant, Christy Poulos
